title: Historical Stock Splits and Corporate Actions of Telos Corp

content.text: Telos Corp went public through its initial public offering (IPO) on the NASDAQ stock exchange on October 1, 2021.
There have been no stock splits in Telos Corp's history.
Telos Corp has not declared any dividends.
On June 28, 2022, Telos Corp completed a secondary offering, issuing additional shares of stock to the public.
On July 15, 2022, Telos Corp announced the acquisition of a cybersecurity company, further expanding its portfolio and capabilities.
On November 3, 2022, Telos Corp released its financial results for the third quarter, reporting strong revenue growth and increased profitability.
On February 15, 2023, Telos Corp released its financial results for the fourth quarter, exceeding expectations and achieving record-breaking revenues.
Telos Corp continues to show promising growth prospects, leveraging its cybersecurity expertise to capitalize on increasing demand for secure technology solutions.
